dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 19 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com





Incident#1

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Advantages of Dedicated Web Hosting Solutions" by Steve Schneider posted on the Article Insider web site at http://webhosting.articleinsider.com/34715 dedicated web hosting solutions_html

Search Query: "The web hosting company provides both hardware and network set up for the initial phase of the service." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.hostbyte.com/webhosting-article/12/

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com 
Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 
Phone: [private]

Email of infringing website: N/A

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Fax to: [private]





Incident#2

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Good 800 Numbers Are Customized" by Joy MacKay posted on the Article Insider web site at http://vanitynumbers.articleinsider.com/32205_good 800 numbers.html

Search Query: The best type of 800 numbers are the ones that are tailored to fit your needs."

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.freedom800.com/articles/Good-800-Numbers.php

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com 
Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private], Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 
Phone: [private]

Email of infringing website: [private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Fax to: [private]





Incident#3

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Play Casino Poker and Experience the Fun" by Jason Dumpit posted on the Article Insider web site at http://pokerarticleinsider.com/32317 play casino poker.html

Search Query: "It is easy to play casino poker online, and you can begin winning tons of cash by doing something that you have done since you were a teen." 

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.bonus-code-empire-poker.com/articles/Play--Casino-Poker.htm

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com
Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private]. Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 
Phone: [private]

Email of infringing website: N/A

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Fax to. [private]

Incident#11

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.realestate
